headline: Duke Energy Indiana agrees to Cayuga coal unit feasibility study in addition to building new gas units on-site
summary: Duke Energy Indiana and Reliable Energy Inc., which represents several of Indiana's major coal producers, have reached a settlement in Duke Energy Indiana's request pending before the Indiana Utility Regulatory Commission for a proposed new natural gas plant at its Cayuga Generating Station in Vermillion County, Ind.

headline: Duke Energy Plans Rate Increase
summary: 'This proposal reflects the investments we have made to strengthen the grid, improve storm readiness, maintain and enhance our generating fleet, and serve a growing customer base'.
